home.welcomeMessage: Log in on Digikuntz Payments to transfer money
home.welcomeMessage1: Digikuntz Payments is a mobile application that allows you to create and manage your events.
home.welcomeMessage2: You can create events, invite friends, and manage your invitations.

item.needToParticipeToGetLink: Register for the event to get the visio link.

terms.title: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
terms.subtitle: Last updated: 07/21/2024
terms.notificationsContent: This permission allows Digikuntz Payments to send you notifications about events you're registered for, important updates, and personalized offers.
terms.justificationContent: These notifications help you not to miss important events and stay informed about the latest news.
terms.cameraAccessContent: This permission allows Digikuntz Payments to access your device's camera to scan ticket QR codes at events.
terms.justificationCamera: This feature is essential to facilitate your access to events by scanning your ticket.
terms.privacyPolicyIntro: This privacy policy describes how Digikuntz Payments collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our website and mobile application.
terms.collectedInfoIntro: We collect different types of information to provide you with our services:
terms.name: Full name
terms.provideServiceDesc: Manage your account and enable access to our features
terms.personalizeDesc: Adapt content and recommendations to your preferences
terms.communicateDesc: Inform you about updates and relevant events
terms.improveDesc: Analyze usage to optimize the application
terms.securityDesc: Protect your account and our services
terms.permissionsIntro: To function properly, the application requires certain permissions:
terms.googleCalendarDesc: This permission allows the application to sync your events with your Google Calendar.
terms.googleCalendarJustification: This feature is essential to help you manage your events efficiently and receive reminders.
terms.marketingConsentDesc: I agree to receive marketing communications and event updates
terms.analyticsConsentDesc: I agree to have my usage data collected to improve the application
terms.calendarConsentDesc: I agree to sync with my Google Calendar
terms.dataUsage: We collect the following data when you register and use Digikuntz Payments:
terms.dataUsageSubtitle: The collected data is used for:
terms.endTerms: By signing up for Digikuntz Payments, you agree to these privacy clauses, terms, and user data usage policy.
terms.policyP1: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page, and the update date will be indicated at the top of the policy. We encourage you to regularly review this page to stay informed about potential changes.
terms.cookiesP1: We use cookies to enhance your experience on Digikuntz Payments. Cookies allow us to remember your preferences and provide personalized service. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, but this may affect certain features of the platform.
terms.userRight3: Request the deletion of your data
terms.userRightEnd: To exercise these rights, please contact us at:
terms.dataSharing2: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
terms.dataSecurityP1: We take the security of your data very seriously. We use technical and organisational security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, modification, or destruction.
terms.usage1: Create and manage your user account
terms.usage2: Facilitate the creation and management of events
terms.usage3: Improve our services and user experience
terms.usage4: Send you notifications and updates about your events
terms.usage5: Ensure the security of our users and the platform
terms.eventData: Information about events you create, manage, or participate in
terms.dataSharingSubtitle: Your personal data will never be sold to third parties. However, we may share your information with trusted partners who adhere to our privacy policy to:
terms.p1: Welcome to Digikuntz Payments, your money transfer platform. By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions, as well as our privacy policy.
terms.termsMessage: By creating an account, you agree to our terms of use and privacy policy.
